data.message: the only change that I can see is that the adds are bigger. and I have no idea what you did to the font but now its a headache each time I get on the FB site.

replies.message: I was just going to say the same thing!  Won't be spending much time on FB because this font gives me a headache and puts me in a very bad mood!
i agree the font was awful the first several days i had the new newsfeed. seems to be better in some areas now
The font actually gives you a headache?  You better go to the doctor.
yes Sonia the font gives me a headache and the eye doctor said yes it is possible
I wondered why I was having a headache these past few days.

mark zuckerburg facebook creator and the whole facebook management team how about please putting facebook the way it originally was way back when way before you ever started the whole facebook "timeline" stuff i liked it better when it was like that i think eveybody did please and thank you
we have headaches because of the many ads FORCED on our brains. It is a rejection reaction of our brains.
I'm finding that I spend a LOT less time on facebook with this new font.  The old layout was easier on the eyes and relaxing.  I HATE THIS.
